Detailed Description

The base class for numeric managed variables. This class provides a read-only interface to the numeric value.

This class cannot be directly instantiated.

See Also:
RTRManagedObject, RTRManagedString, RTRManagedBoolean, RTRManagedCounter, RTRManagedGauge, RTRManagedNumericRange, RTRManagedStringConfig, RTRManagedNumericConfig, RTRManagedBooleanConfig, RTRManagedGaugeConfig
